name: Otomedius Excellent
summary: The lovely rocket-riding ladies of Otomedius Gorgeous arrive in the US for the first time in Otomedius Excellent, the highly anticipated sequel to the Japan-exclusive arcade hit. Otomedius Excellent is an Xbox 360 exclusive and features nearly ten playable characters, heart-pounding classic Gradius-style shoot-em-up gameplay, a dazzling array of stunning visuals, thrilling multiplayer action locally or via a connection to Xbox LIVE, an improved upgrade system, downloadable content and of course the Otomedius Excellent game disc. With all this and more it is sure to be the must-own arcade style shooter for Xbox 360 players in 2011 and beyond.

name: Othello
summary: Othello is a conversion of the board game. It was developed by Kawada and published by HAL Laboratory for the Famicom Disk System in Japan.

name: Otogi: Myth of Demons
summary: On a dark and gloomy bridge, suspended between the world of the living and the dead, lurks Raikoh, a skilled warrior from a cursed clan. Once tasked with ending the lives of others, Raikoh himself sits between life and death after the Great Seal was broken, spreading destruction and darkness across the land. A mysterious princess spares Raikoh's life so that he may rid the world of the grotesque demons and cleanse his soul of his past misdeeds. Raikoh must travel through desolate lands to fight hordes of fearsome, immortal creatures with 12 varieties of magic, more than 30 brutal weapons, and over 10 special demon-slaying items. Trees, walls, and even entire buildings are destroyed as Raikoh unleashes his skillful fury in order to purge both the world's demons and his own.

name: Otogi 2: Immortal Warriors
summary: Take the role of the undead warrior Raikoh Minamoto and his companions as they are tasked with vanquishing the invading hordes of demons and protecting Japan's capital city from being consumed by the darkness.

name: OTTTD
summary: OTTTD stands for Over The Top Tower Defence, and you'll see why when you're blasting 9 kinds of hell out of a Cactus Ghost that's making a beeline for your battlefield HQ. You play as a commander for HEROCORP, the 4th largest private military organization in the galaxy. A long period of peace has left the company coffers a little bare so the science division developed Trans-Dimensional Rifts, opening up lucrative opportunities for war in other universes. It's like Starship Troopers meets Stargate meets Spaceballs, with way more explosions.

name: Otomedius Gorgeous!
summary: Otomedius Gorgeous is the Xbox 360 port of Otomedius Arcade, a side scrolling shooter by Konami which featured personification of space fighters from various Konami games like Gradius, Xexex, Salamander and Parodius. The name is a pun, being a portmanteau of the terms "otome" (meaning "maiden" in Japanese) and "Gradius". It was released for the Japanese Xbox 360 in November 20, 2008.

name: Otherland
summary: Otherland is an Unreal-powered action-MMORPG based on Tad Williams highly acclaimed novels. Embark on exciting adventures in a virtual multiverse where you fight the Red Queen's army in the medieval 8Squared, explore Mars, hunt on Bug World or socialize in the bars of futuristic Lambda Mall.

name: Othello
summary:
This is ancient board game of Othello (another name is Reversi). You must capture opponent's pieces, placing your stones on board. Any opponent's stones directly between your new stone and any of your old ones became captured and reversed to your color.

You can play with friend or with computer.

This is anonymous BASIC version of 1982, translated from TRS-80 version.

name: Otogi: Spirit Agents
summary: Otogi: Spirit Agents is a game for mobile platforms. It is a fantasy RPG / Card Battler.

name: Othello
summary:
GAME DETAILS
Wherever, whenever, whoever! Classic boardgame "Othello"!

The well-acclaimed boardgame for all ages, "Othello" is now on Nintendo Switch!

Play in the comfort of your home or outside, and play in a style that suits you best!

A total of 16 levels of computer AI difficulty are available for Single Player Modes!

Hints on where the stones can be placed, and displays to show which tiles will be flipped in this move are also available to help new players understand the game better!

Two-player mode is also available!
Both players can play together on 1 Nintendo Switch by simply sharing the Joy-con, or simply operate directly on the Touch Screen!
Do play with your family and friends!

name: Otome Romance Jigsaws - Midnight Cinderella & Destined to Love
summary: "Otome Romance Jigsaws - Midnight Cinderella & Destined to Love" is a jigsaw puzzle game featuring many illustrations of "Midnight Cinderella：Ikémen Royal Romances" and "Destined to Love: Ikémen Samurai Romances" those are very popular Otome romance novel games in Japan.

name: Otherworld: Omens of Summer Collector's Edition
summary: Dark magic threatens our world! Can you stop the Shade and his minions before it's too late?

name: Other worlds India
summary: Pure metroidvania game, adventures, secret locations, tons of weapons, and of course hardcore gameplay.

name: Other Tanks
summary: Other Tanks - an unusual tank arcade game with fun gameplay. Your task - to destroy enemy vehicles, your weapon - a huge cannon, charged with deadly ammunition!

name: Otherworld: Spring of Shadows Collector's Edition
summary: Save a lost girl!

name: Otem's Defiance
summary: You play as Otem, a child who has been chosen as a sacrifice to the gods of his tribe. As they materialize in the center of the ring-shaped arena, you must dodge their attacks and fight back to survive the ritual and uncover the secrets of this gruesome tradition lead by the mysterious Shaman.

name: Otoboke Ninja Colosseum
summary:
Otoboke Ninja Colosseum ("Your Ninja Jokes Colosseum") is a multiplayer action game developed by Mint and published by Intec for the Super Famicom platform. It supports up to four human players who can compete with each other in top-down arenas. Alternatively, one or two players can take on the story mode in its single-player or two-player cooperative modes.

The game has a comedic edge, true to its name, and concerns a quartet of kunoichi as they locate a stolen scroll. Each maze involves finding a way to the enemies, destroying them with shuriken bombs and then progressing to the next. The player(s) can also find power-up icons, which increase the strength and number of their shuriken bombs, or perform other useful feats like freezing all the enemies on-screen.

name: Otocky
summary: Otocky can be described as a musical side-scrolling shoot 'em up. The player's spaceship has a ball for a weapon, which can be fired in eight directions; each direction corresponds to a different musical note. The note plays when the player presses the fire button, and is also quantized in time so that it matches the beat playing in the background. By using the weapon selectively the player can improvise music while playing.

name: Othello World
summary: Othello World is a Miscellaneous game, developed by Dice and published by Tsukuda Original, which was released in Japan in 1992.

name: Otogirisou
summary: One summer evening, a young man and a woman were driving down a winding mountain road. You take the role of the young man. The young woman is named Nami. The two of you attend the same college. While driving back home from an out-of-town date, you got into an accident. The car's brakes suddenly stopped working, leaving the car totaled and the two of you clueless about where to go, until you spotted the mailbox of a nearby home. Together, you trudged through the woods, struck by the rain and trembling from the lightning. Nami was looking more and more displeased. Emerging from the woods, you found an old western-style mansion gated off with high walls.

name: Otaku no Seiza: An Adventure in the Otaku Galaxy
summary: Otaku no Seiza tells the story of Fuyuu City, a place built in space far in the future. Aurora, a group of five attractive and powerful women, control the city. Men in the city are treated poorly compared to women, until the protagonist finds himself in the middle of the city with amnesia. Outraged, the protagonist decides to defeat Aurora and gain rights for the discriminated men of the city.

name: Otto's Ottifanten: Baby Bruno's Nightmare
summary:
Baby Bruno has had nightmare! A magician has dissolved his Teddy Honk and he may never be seen again. Only you can help him to rescue the teddy bear. But for that you need Baby Bruno to enter the mysterious cylinder, where you will face nasty traps, obstacles and enemies.

Plunge into the adventure and "crack" one level after another: Hike through a secret forest where every tree is an obstacle. Enter a castle full of trickery and pitfalls - and press forward into the dungeon where Honk is trapped.

name: OtterBash
summary: Otter Bash!!! The Otters have escaped their habitat and are now wreaking havoc for world dominance. Battle your friends with the cute and adorable little critters. Destroy your opponents with unique weapons; dousing each other with Tar Balloons, smack them with the nifty Taco Boomerang, shove them into your "Portable Oven" and see them roast!!!

name: Othello Millennium
summary: Othello Millennium is a board game developed by Tomcat System and published by Tsukuda Original for the Game Boy Color platform. Othello Millennium was only released in Japan.

name: Otto's Ottifanten: Kommando Stortebeker
summary: Ottifanten: Kommando Störtebeker is an auto-running 2D platformer. Baby Bruno goes on a search after his missing teddy bear Honk, through four worlds of six stages each.

name: Othello
summary: Othello is a conversion of the board game. Each player tries to fill the game board with as many discs of his color as possible. On each turn the player places a disc on the board by selecting a location where the opponents discs will become trapped between two of his discs. The trapped discs are flipped over to the players color. The game ends when the board is filled or time runs out, and the player with the greatest number of his color discs on the board wins. Two players can play against each other, or one player against the computer.

name: Othello
summary: The CDi version of Othello allows players to challenge Albert Einstein and Leonardo da Vinci for some reason.

name: Othello World II: Yume to Michi e no Chousen
summary: The PlayStation-exclusive sequel to Tsukada Original's Othello World.

name: Otherworld: Shades of Fall Collector's Edition
summary: Explore a world of magic to stop an ancient evil!

name: Otome ga Tsumugu Koi no Canvas
summary:
Shin was instructed to record a TV program as usual by his sister Hatora, who was a famous artist. When he turned on the screen, he saw a photo of himself dressed as a girl being auctioned for lots of money. Hatora quipped that next time she’ll take a nude photo of him. Sensing danger, he ran away from home... only to realize later that he was still dressed as a girl.

He ended up in front of the art gallery and a seemingly rich girl Rena asked why he was there so late at night. Mistaken for a student at the nearby girls-only art school Oukou Gakuen, he was taken inside to observe a bunch of paintings being brought into the gallery. Suddenly, he noticed some thieves and ended up getting taken hostage. After being saved by Rena’s bodyguard Chiharu, he thought he was free to go... but then Rena ushered him into the waiting limousine and took him to her mansion!

Rena questioned him how he had known that the paintings were fake and demanded to know his name, upon which he replied Mizuki, which was his surname. With the help of the head maid Akie, he managed to not have his identity fully blown. Then Rena presented him with a school uniform and told him that she had signed him up at Oukou Gakuen after hearing that he didn’t attend school. He will also serve as her maid. Unable to return home, how will Shin..., no, Mizuki fare in this new setting!?

name: Otome ga Tsumugu Koi no Canvas: Futari no Gallery
summary: This is the fandisc for Otome ga Tsumugu Koi no Canvas. It features after/another stories for the top 5 in the character poll: Rena, Chiharu, Shizuku, Yuki and Akie.

name: Otome ga Kanaderu Koi no Aria
summary:
Tsukasa is a sopranista-in-training, a male who can sing in the same vocal range as a female soprano. He had been studying overseas for the past year and came back to Japan a month early for vacation to surprise his parents. However, they were gone for a trip and were having the house fully renovated while away, so he ended up without a place to stay. After deciding to live alone for the month, he met a girl named Ayaka by chance when she heard him sing at the park. She told him that she had been looking for someone who could sing like him and wanted him to come to her school to sing at the upcoming festival. Even though he was troubled at the sudden request, he wasn’t able to turn her down and ended up at Shinou Academy, a European-style girls’ school.

“W-Wait! D-Didn’t I tell you I’m a boy?”
“But with your looks and voice…”

His complaints fell on deaf ears and after being dressed up in girls’ clothes, he was surprised when he looked in the mirror. Tsukasa agreed to attend Miou Academy for the month as a girl, Izumi, and star as a ‘diva’ at the Shinou Festival one month later.

name: Otome ga Kanaderu Koi no Aria: Kimi ni Sasageru Encore
summary: This is the fan disc for Otome ga Kanaderu Koi no Aria, featuring after stories for each of the 5 heroines and added heroine Kanade, while chara poll winner Kei will get a route as well. Two additional patches (for Mikoto and Kotori/Yuuhi) will also be available for download from their website for a month after the release.

name: Otome Riron to Sono Shuuhen: Ecole de Paris
Otoko Yuukaku
summary: A remake of Gyakuten Yoshiwara featuring more CGs, voices, and longer scenarios. The remake also features a new character, Itou Keiji, who has a route.

name: Otaku's Fantasy
summary:
I was a deadbeat.
After times and times of getting fire, I worked as a cleanup crew, just trying to make a living. When I got nothing to do, I can only play with myself. Later a AI company took me in, I thought the job will just be slightly better than the last one. i just want a new life, a better one.

But it's like a different world! Office ladies from powerful companies, celebrities, and rich cugars. This is all too much for an otaku like me.

One day, a cute actress called my name and said 'Hey are you a boy or a girl?' I was so angry my vains were about to pop. So I just whipped it out. The next day everyone call me ladyboy.

From then on, a new world had opened the door for me. All kinds of women threw themselves at me, and for all kinds of strange reasons. No matter it is a mixed-race lady with huge buttocks, a well-known news anchor secretly wants to be whipped, or a hungry cugar that almost eats me up, they all wants to know what it's like to be with me. But there's no stopping this!

This is otaku's dream world, if you want 'em, just get 'em!

name: Otherworld: Spring of Shadows
summary: PC

name: Otherworld: Omens of Summer
summary: PC

name: Otis
summary: Puzzle game resembling SameGame.

name: Ottifanten Pinball
summary: Ottifanten Pinball is a German pinball game for the Game Boy Advance.

name: Otto Matic
summary: Players take on the role of Otto Matic, a friendly robot, who must save humanity from the evil Brain Aliens of Planet X. Aliens have taken the humans to faraway planets, which Otto must travel to in order to rescue them.

name: Otto the Odd Ostrich
summary: What more could you want from a crazy ostrich infinite runner!

name: Otona no Joushikiryoku Training DS
summary:
Otona no Jōshikiryoku Training DS (JP) is a Nintendo DS video game better known as General Knowledge Training and Common Sense Training in western territories.

You are only able to partake in the activities a little bit each day answering questions regarding art, music, courtesy, manners and other skills. Afterwards you'll be given a stamp no matter how well you performed.

name: Otsuge Uranai nan desu
summary: Otsugē Uranai nandesu is a fortune telling game, developed and published by Dorart, which was released in Japan in 2008.

name: Otometeki Koi Kakumei Love Revo!!
summary: Otometeki Koi Kakumei Love Revo is a otome game for PS2.

name: Other Worlds
summary: Other Worlds is a freeware game made by alkis polyrakis. It is a classic point and click adventure made with adventure game studio. It is an adventure that has many places to go and riddles to solve. Its story is very well developed. You must travel to other worlds in order to save your loved one. The main character is a female one. The game has a lot of spells and it has implemented them in a clever way.

name: Otherland
summary: A Massively Multiplayer online game that takes place in author Tad William's universe of virtual reality gone horribly wrong. In it, players create an avatar, which represents an avatar in an online world. Characters fight to maintain their identities, or create new ones, while fleeing the influence of conspirators who wish to trap the users of this online universe and use them as playthings.

name: Otome wa Boku ni Koishiteru Portable
summary: This is Playstation Portable version of the eriotic visual novel of the same name.

name: Otonano Tamu no Keisan Training DS
summary: Math training program for adults by IE Institute CO., Ltd. for Nintendo's DSiWare.

name: Othello
summary: Home Entertainment Suppliers' version of digital reversi.

name: Otome wa Boku ni Koishiteru: Futari no Elder

external_ids.url: https://www.twitch.tv/directory/game/Otome wa Boku ni Koishiteru: Futari no Elder

name: Otonari no Kokujin Otto ni Dakarete Nakimodaeru Saiai no Tsuma. Sono Hikikae ni Ajiwau Kokujin Tsuma no Hada. Big Black Cock & Big Black Butt & My Sweet Wife
summary: A visual novel from Orcsoft.

name: Otaku's Fantasy 2
summary: one day, a portal opened for appearantly no reason, evils poured in - the devil who wants to rule the world, slime princess that's acutally kinda cute, blood-thirsting succubus, fox of mystery and sexy mermaids. I was enslaved by those beautiful monstresses and drilled day by day. But everytime I died I got stronger, and one day, I gotta conquer them all!

name: Ottoman Empire: Spectacular Millennium
summary: Ottoman Empire: Spectacular Millenium offers you a unique adventure experience via the immortal janissary that is travelling through time, struggling to change it.

name: Otto and the Ancient Worlds
summary: Otto and the Ancient Worlds is an 8-bit 2D adventure platformer about an archaeologist who discovers an ancient library filled with magical books. Each book contains a living story of a mythology or folklore, and Otto mistakenly releases their contents into the world! Otto must return the mythology and folklore back to their books and destroy an 8-headed beast that has been released in the process.

name: Otto
summary: Say hello to Otto, the laziest hamster to inhabit a virtual world!

name: Othello 2018
summary: The classic version of the famous board game Othello.

name: Otter of My Life
summary: A LGBTQ+ game with otters~

name: Otome Games: Is It Love? Ryan
Otomedius X
summary:
Otomedius Excellent is an Xbox 360 game and the sequel to the 2007 arcade game Otomedius by Konami, which is a spin-off of the side-shooting game Gradius series. It was released in March 2011 in Japan and early November of 2011.

Otomedius Excellent features a single player campaign with a new story, and a Multiplay mode in which 2 other players can play in. Players with an Xbox Live subscription can play online with other players in Score Attack mode and check their scores against other players on the Leaderboard. Alternate costumes and new stages were made available after release.

name: Othercide
summary:
Othercide is a horror themed tactical turn-based game set in an esoteric world beyond our reality. The game will place the player in control of female warriors, in a desperate struggle to push back nightmarish creatures and prevent reality from shattering.

Using only black, white and touch of red, the game will drag players into a whole new universe for the genre, to experience a journey through a strange and unknown world, a world that lays behind the mirror of their own minds.

name: Otaku no Omocha in High Priest
Otokomizu
summary: Hovering in the sky over Edo City with a loincloth! A jet pack firefighting 3D action feelinggame with the most mysterious operation ever!

name: Otiiz's adventure - Sushi Champ
summary: Otiiz spends all his money and is driven out. His friend suggests that he joins the big eater competition held by the sushi restaurant. As long as he wins, he can get the bonus of the best.

name: Others
summary: Others is a first person exploration game set in a falling cycle of red and darkness.

name: Otaku's Adventure
summary: Otaku's Adventure is an anime-style AVG that tells the story of an Otaku who has been single since birth and craves to be loved. After a romantic encounter with three charming girls, your life will take an unexpected turn: to go on a run-away adventure with Waifu, an outer-space travel with Gohard, or an exploration in a fantasy world.

name: Otiiz's adventure 2
summary: Otiiz's Adventure 2 is a RPG card game. Recently, there have been frequent incidents in which villagers have been attacked by strange robots. Player can explore the town together with our protagonist, Otiiz. And discover the secrets of the town with the his friends, start the combat training to defend the town!

name: Othercell
summary: Othercell is a story-heavy RPG inspired by the 90s title like Final Fantasy and Resident Evil. Othercell will allow you to play as Adam Brandt, a police officer who got caught in a strange and dangerous situation in his hometown. "Link" with your enemies to survive and build strong teams to defeat the toughest foes!

name: Otawamure
summary: "Otawamure" is a Japanese word meaning "to play around, to fool around or to toy with". Play with tender objects in this virtual space and experience “otawamure” for yourself.

name: Otter Space Rescue
summary: Your Otter Space crew has been captured by evil robots. Save your team and fight together through endless rooms of evil robots.

name: Other: Her Loving Embrace
summary: Other is an RPG with a twist: stylish action combat mixed with turn-based battles. Explore, solve puzzles, and vanquish your foes as you uncover the secrets of a secluded town besieged by the supernatural.

name: Other Submarine
summary: Trapped at the bottom of the ocean, you only have your trusty flashlight and a reliable submarine. Can you reach the surface before what lies beneath takes you?

name: Other Side
summary:
Don't worry, we'll all meet to the other side! 
 
Arrows to move, space or enter to use the stones. 
 
Made for the Ludum Dare 30

name: Othello
summary:
Othello (オセロ) is a SG-1000 video game based on the board game Othello.

Two versions of Othello exist for the SG-1000. The first version, released in 1983, was built into the Othello Multivision (which is where the system gets its name from). Sega would later re-release this game in cartridge form in 1985, offering significant graphical and AI improvements over Tsukuda Original's version.

name: Otenba Becky no Daibouken
summary: A classic platform game. Our mission will be to destroy all the aliens before time runs out. To do this, Becky can make holes in the ground (except in the lower platform) as a trap to try to make enemies fall into them.

name: Othello
summary: Othello board game for BBC Micro. At the start of each game the players place four counters at the center of the board. Thereafter the players take it in turns to place a counter with their own colour face up on an empty square in such a way there are at least one counter of the opposite colour sandwiched between it and another of the player's colour in either a horizontal, vertical or diagonal direction.

name: Otherside
summary: Otherside is a psychedelic first person exploration game set between worlds.

name: Otherworld Legends
summary: Explore beautiful otherworlds like tranquil bamboo grooves, zen patios, grand underworld tombs or dreamy mirage palace. Master heroes with fiery temper and overwhelming power. Collect bizarre and funny items and experiment with their combinations to find the best build. Together with the randomly generated world, every playthrough is a thrilling experience.

name: Otti: House Keeper
summary: The mix of tower defense and puzzle, use traps to defend the house. Great designed levels, a bunch of traps, and mechanisms choose how you will defeat them!

name: Otti: The House Keeper
summary: Otti: house keeper is a game about defending your house from thieves and uninvited guests. Help Otti, a thief in the past, to get rid of ghosts of the past. Otti was cursed and can't contact with humans, so use traps, mechanism and logic to save Otti live and his gold. Every level - is a new building and specially designed puzzle, use your reaction and ingenuity to solve it. Fully playable with touchscreen! TRAPS: A large selection of all kinds of traps, each with a unique mechanics of work. Launch ghosts, drop an anvil on the thief's head, use evil cacti and this is the lesser part of what you have to use. MANIPULATION: It is not enough to set a trap and wait, you need to lure the thief into it. Manipulate the attention of thieves with sounds: hit vases and boxes, blow up barrels. Now they play by your rules. MECHANISMS: Sometimes traps aren't enough to defeat a well-trained thief. Then mechanisms come to the rescue. Transport belts to deliver a stone directly to the head or a magnetic wheel to remove armor from a thief. SAFE-CRACKING: Otti has lost the keys to his safes, you will need to pass the safe cracking mini-games to get the coveted gold. TREASURE: Collect all the gold to the treasury, fill it to the top. Find secret objects to replenish your treasury with unique items.

name: Otome Domain
summary:
Minato’s last blood-relative, his grandmother, passed away and now he is all alone in this world. He thinks about how he was blessed to have family, but dryly laughs about how he’ll need to take care of himself now.

However, during the funeral of his grandmother, someone named Kazari approaches him and offers to admit him into a prestigious school, in addition to providing him a place to reside. Minato immediately and thankfully takes up on this offer, but soon realizes that the Suzu Academy is an all-girl’s school, and the "ojou-sama" that he’ll be residing with has flaws of their own which really shattered his expectation for a high-class lady.

name: Otome Riron to Sono Shuuhen Bon Voyage
Otaku's Rage: Waifu Strikes Back
summary:
This is a visual story with match3 combat system. You will be able to upgrade your character and gain new abilities in battle.) this line is fine 
 
You will have to fight each girl so that she will teach you her tricks that she knows, because in the finale you will have to defeat the main villain of the World of Waifu.

name: Other Life
summary:
Have you ever dreamed of being a blacksmith? An alchemist? Or even a mercenary? Then you have come to the right place.

Other-Life is a community based game that allows you to affect the future of the game.Your actions and decisions along with all the other players will be used to influence the world of your Other-Life. Unlike other MMORPG's, Other-Life players have the ability to request & approve changes to the game as it evolves!

The Other-Life client is multi-platform using OpenGL for the 3D and graphics environment, currently available for Windows, Linux, & Mac and it works on many lower end systems.

name: Otherworldly
summary: In Otherworldly your objective is to search maze for gold. But be careful, because dangerous monsters lurks in the shadows as well. Use your dexterity to avoid being caught! Find gold, hide in the dark and proceed to the exit.Atmospheric, horror-like game in which your aim to find gold in the labyrinth. Avoid traps, monsters and try to escape with legendary treasures.

name: OtherWordly
summary: The letters of Alphazoid Prime have begun to vanish, and you must solve the mystery. Team up with the Termarians to restore order by matching related words, harvesting life-giving energy, and avoiding treacherous obstacles.

name: Other World
summary: Adventure of Other Side. A World full of Quests, Equipment, Items and dangerous monsters to discover.

name: Otaku Club
summary: Otaku Club is an addicting game in which you have to solve puzzles with Lovely Girls.The game is perfect for relaxing.

name: Otome the Exorcist
summary: When the city of Himori is struck by nests of terrifying Voracites, the only ones who can counter the scourge are individuals known as Exorcists.

name: Othello Let's Go
summary: Othello Let's Go is a beautifully designed strategy board game for all ages. A total of 8 levels of computer AI difficulty, suits for both beginners and experts! More than 100 carefully selected Endgame and Lights Out levels are waiting for you to solve!

name: Other Realms
summary: Dwarven based survival multiplayer game, craft, build your kingdom piece by piece. Set foundations, forge devices and conquer your dwarven realm.

name: Othello Masters
summary: Players take turns placing disks on the board with their assigned color facing up. During a play, any disks of the opponent's color that are in a straight line and bounded by the disk just placed and another disk of the current player's color are turned over to the current player's color. The object of the game is to have the majority of disks turned to display your color when the last playable empty square is filled.

name: OtherSide
summary: A fun little game

name: Otherworldly Stars
summary: Otherworldly Stars' theme is "You Are The Monster".

name: Ottopunk
summary: A dashing platformer

name: Other Minds
summary: Brutal collectathon platforming action with added mind control

name: OtterQuest
summary: You’ve been given an odd request, and without protest, you get dressed and grab your sword from your weapons chest, and with much zest, you head west to complete your Otter Quest.

name: Otome no Himitsu
summary: Otome No Himitsu is an addicting game in which you have to solve puzzles with Lovely Girls.The game is perfect for relaxing.

name: OtherSoul
summary: In this horror game, you must do everything you can to escape the demon’s clutches alive. Your soul is at stake. You will be saved or you will be damned forever. Remember, in the game, your choices can affect the people most important to you. Protect them and your mental state! Fight to the end!

name: Otherwar
summary:
Otherwar is an action tower defense game. Take control of an angel and defend heaven from the satan's armies.

Unlike other Tower Defense games, Otherwar's cast of enemies will keep you on your toes as almost every enemy fires a different kind of projectile. From the ever-following eyeballs to slowly approaching wide spider webs and patterns of swirling leaves cast by undead treants.

Before each mission you will have a chance to select towers and skills that will aid you in battle. From straight-forward offensive towers to more situational constructs such as slowing fields that will bog down approaching enemies or emplacements that shoot down incoming projectiles.

name: Otomaid @ Cafe
summary: Otomaid @ Cafe is a femboy maid cafe eroge. Kei agrees to take a part-time job at his brother Iori's cafe. Then he learns that it's a maid cafe run by crossdressers, and his cute coworkers are actually boys. He doesn't understand why men would want to wear women's clothing, but he's about to learn.

name: Otome ga Musubu Tsukiyo no Kirameki
summary:
Touya works at the residence of the Shijou family, one of the most prominent zaibatsu in the country, keeping an eye on and being of assistance to the lone daughter Ran. One day, it was decided that the free-spirited Ran will temporarily transfer to the Meigetsu Girls’ School. Since everyone at the school, from its students to the staff, are female, it would be impossible for a boy like Touya to enter on a moment’s notice.

“Well, I will be taking care of other duties while you are there then.”
“… What are you saying? You’re coming along too”
“Eh? But, it’s a girls’ school where boys are forbidden…”
“So you’ll be coming with me, as a girl”

Not only would he have to cross-dress, but she wanted him to take her place in some situations. Despite his protests, he was ultimately defeated by her tears and unwillingly consented to entering the school as Yuuki. Will he be able to continue helping her there without having his cover blown?

name: Otakle
summary: A game inspired the popular web-based game Wordle where you need to guess the name of an anime or gaming character within 6 tries. Every try gives you new hints on who the mystery character is. A new puzzle is available every day at midnight. After you're done with the daily puzzle, you can share your score with friends and see who does better.

name: Other
summary: Challenge your friends in Other ! Collect 5 letters to eliminate your opponents, be the last player alive to win !

name: Otome Chat Connection
summary: Otome Chat Connection is a game made by SEEC, featuring text conversations with different characters.

name: Otoko Cross: Pretty Boys Mahjong Solitaire
summary: Meet 5 cute cross-dressing characters as they challenge you to tile-matching mahjong solitaire! Clear the playfield and unlock new outfits for your companions in this this celebration of Japanese "otokonoko" style and sub-culture.

name: OTXO
summary: OTXO is a fast, brutal, violent roguelite, filled with precise but savage gunplay and time-bending slow motion.

name: Otterna
summary: Otterna is a Hardcore Platformer Adventure Game.

name: Othello: Daynight Time Clash
summary: Transcending time and space -- Nymphs from all dimensions, emerge and engage! Let's Othello!

name: Otherworld: Spring of Shadows & Otherworld: Omens of Summer
Otter Chaos
summary: Otter chaos is a 3D cute, cooperative puzzle solving game where you play as otters who scramble to chase their mischievous babies back home before the zookeeper notices!

name: Otoko Cross: Pretty Boys Klondike Solitaire
summary: Meet 5 cute cross-dressing characters as they challenge you to classic solitaire! Win with the cards you're dealt and unlock new outfits for your companions in this this celebration of Japanese "otokonoko" style and sub-culture.

name: Otto's Magic Blocks
summary: Teach Otto new tricks as you bound through quirky levels. Beware! The magic board is flat, so you dont want to leap lazily off the end! Go bonkers and spring towards those power-ups cuz the bad bugs are out to get you! Uncover secret levels in this Dreamland Arcade hit!

name: Otherside
summary:
A Strange New World
We set out to build the Otherside with one thing in mind: the metaverse should be anything but boring.

The world should be dynamic, steeped in narrative, and your actions should hold consequence.

Step into the Otherside, where the normal rules do not apply.

Where you end up is up to chance. Where you go is up to you.

Otherside is a gamified, interoperable metaverse currently under development. The game blends mechanics from massively multiplayer online role playing games (MMORPGs) and web3-enabled virtual worlds.

name: Otherworld Legends: Jadetalon
summary:
This content requires the base game Otherworld Legends on in order to play.

A feisty battlemaiden with a petite build and uncanny brawn who mows down enemies with graceful sweeps of her prodigious glaive. She is apparently the co-owner of a strange mirror that grants passage to a number of different worlds, and has falled into the illusory realm created by Asurendra during a training tour alongside her sister.

name: Otherworld Legends: Ebonfang
summary:
This content requires the base game Otherworld Legends in order to play.

A youthful martial combatant armed with throwing spikes who utilizes her blazing speed to unleash withering volleys of steel upon her foes from the air. She is apparently the co-owner of a strange mirror that grants passage to a number of different worlds, and has fallen into the illusory realm created by Asurendra during a training tour alongside her sister.

name: Otometeki Koi Kakumei Love Revo!! DS
summary: A port of Otometeki Koi Kakumei Love Revo for the Nintendo DS.

name: Otometeki Koi Kakumei Love Revo! Portable
summary: Otometeki Koi Kakumei * Love Revo! Portable is an otome game, developed by HuneX and published by Idea Factory, which was released in Japan in 2010.

name: Otometeki Koi Kakumei Love Revo!! 100kg Kara Hajimaru Koi Monogatari
summary: Remake of the original Otometeki Koi Kakumei Love Revo!! game.

name: Other People's Fiancee Became My Woman
summary: You are a gentleman, one night ~ you heard the sad cry of the girl next door, to comfort her, you knocked on the door and entered her room...

name: Otegaru Puzzle Series: Alice to Mahou no Trump
Otome Legends
summary: A visual novel where the routes are not routes, the endings are not endings, and your choices are not real choices.

name: Othercide: Dressed to Kill - Cosmetics Pack
summary: Expand the variety and flair of your daughters' looks with the Dressed to Kill - Cosmetics Pack including outfit, eye and weapon skin variations. Tailor each Daughter's appearance before sending them to battle the Suffering.

name: Otherworld Legends: Mirelha
summary:
Naga Hero：Mirelha
A resident cleric of the Wayfarer's Guild, Mirelha has delivered many a companion from certain doom, brandishing her divine sanction with a degree of virtuosity that has earned her the unofficial epithet of "Justitia" among peers. While her ministerial cohorts are commonly perceived as of little substance in battle, the extent of providence bestowed upon Mirelha's martial might, in particular, far outstrips the reckoning capabilities of secular minds.

name: Otogi Banashi Taisen
summary: Otogi Banashi Taisen is a Role-Playing game, developed by Sun L and published by Yojigen, which was released in Japan in 1995.

name: Otteretto
summary: A game about palindromes (and otters).

name: Otok
summary: This is a very chill Sandbox "City Builder", No Goals, just build your island as beautifully as you can with the given buildings.

name: Otoshu DX
summary: This expanded sequel of Sound Shooting!! features all of the original game's songs along with new songs and updated gameplay. Like the original game, this blends sidescrolling arcade shooting and rhythm gameplay; this time, the rhythm game sections feature extra lanes for added difficulty.

name: Otherworld Legends: Aigneis
summary: Meet Aigneis: A Selenian princess and an adept astromancer. Aigneis inherits both her father's valiance and her mother's magical affinity, trouncing foes who would trifle with her using her shapeshifting scepter, Mondnacht.

name: Other World Survivors
summary: Other World Survivors is inspired by survivor games and classical games.Pick a hero and survive in the endless coming monster tide, build every skill of yours, and finally beat the Dominators.Game features:1.Personalized upgrade;2.Chemical recations, chain recations.3.Roguelike not Roguelite.

name: Otosan
summary:
An Earthbound-inspired RPG adventure by William Kage, the creator of Fragrant Story.

Being released digitally as “the world's first 10-second 3DS game”, Otosan: Nintendo 3DS Edition launches on March 2023, the same month Nintendo’s eShop service is being discontinued, as a bite-sized microgame which will further be updated into the full product.

name: Otokiyome
summary: A bizarre horror adventure based on the original idea of VTuber "Shirakawa Yuri". Explore a village in the middle of the night and place a PC in a designated spot to purify the sound. A monster appears and attacks to destroy the PC, so escape while protecting the PC.

name: Otter Ocean
summary: Are otter’s just the oceans’ hamsters? They’re playful, fuzzy, and fit in the palm of your hand (at least in this kawaii game app!). Go on a scavenger hunt to find more members of the cute tamagotchi kawaii family. If you like adventure games with a treasure hunt where you can train your pet animals - Otter Ocean is just for you.

name: Otto's Tennis game
summary: One-button tennis for two players! Push the button to jump, spam the button to fly.

name: Otoko Cross: Pretty Boys Breakup!
summary: Meet a diverse cast of 9 cute crossdressing characters as they challenge you in brick-breaking arcade action! Score points to unlock new outfits for your companions in this this celebration of Japanese "otokonoko" style and sub-culture.

name: Otoko Cross: Naked Remix
summary: The Naked Remix is a bundle that includes Pretty Boys Klondike Solitaire + Pretty Boys Mahjong Solitaire!

name: Otherworld Legends: Anibella
summary: This content requires the base game Otherworld Legends on Steam in order to play.

name: Otona no Gal Jan Kimi ni Hane Man
Otoko Cross: Pretty Boys Dropout!
summary: Meet a diverse cast of 9 cute crossdressing characters as they challenge you in block-sliding puzzle action! Score points to unlock new outfits for your companions in this this celebration of Japanese "otokonoko" style and sub-culture.

name: Ottopunks: Gangs of Bosphorus
summary: Ottopunks is an Isometric Action RPG in a vibrant Ottoman Punk World inspired by anime, comic books, arts and street culture. Solve mysteries, defeat enemies and try to survive in this chaotic world.

name: Otto Roof
summary: Coming out on the roof at night, it is not known what can be found there...

name: Othello Shiyou yo
summary: Othello Shiyou yo is an arcade version of Othello.

name: Otherworld Hero
summary: In this turn-based tactical RPG you will take control of a hero from a different time and place, plucked out of their own reality. And now... meet the expectations of the people and become the all beloved hero or forge your own path and reshape the world to whatever your taste is.

name: Otome Games Romance Box
summary: Collection of all Dearead's otome games in one app.

name: Otherworld Legends: Alasdair
summary: This content requires the base game Otherworld Legends 战魂铭人 on Steam in order to play.

name: Ottomax
summary: Ottomax is a game that emulates the entrepreneurship atmosphere, where the player gets to know and practice his entrepreneurial abilities by interacting with the story and deciding on the daily routine of the protagonist trying to make the company successful.

name: Otoko Cross: Pretty Boys Dropout!
summary: A SFW port to Nintendo Switch.

name: O Tutt'i Cavi Lesi
summary:
Full of paper and hatred.
A game will fight against a player.

name: Otaku Puzzle!
summary: A 3D top-down puzzle game with any image, GIF, video allowed, plus multiplayer.

name: Otter Turmoil
summary: Play as an Otter in this Rogue-lite action shooter. Mow down through hordes of goons and enemies as you traverse through Panda's Box. Loot among many guns and powerups to conquer the new world.

name: OTurret
summary: OTurret - is an action tower defense game with elements of engineering and survival where you play as a brave frog defending itself against giant insects. Build various defensive structures, from cannons to magnetic traps, to help the frog survive in a dangerous world.

name: Otherworld Legends: Ourania
summary:
Hero Ourania
Drifts from the perennially snowbound steppes ever accompany the ethereally graceful Ourania, sweeping sin from every corner of the world and delivering her blessings in their stead. Doted upon by the spirits of her animistic ancestors, the fledgeling shamaness swirls and glissades through the immaculate landscape with unfettered carefreeness, her eyes bright as a sky after rain and her elfin form brimming with numinous potential.
[h3]Mark of Shamaness:[/h3]
Your skills and normal attacks apply a stacking Mark of Shamaness on enemies. Once the Mark has reached 8 stacks, your next normal attack will cause it to detonate, dealing damage.
You can absorb Mark of Shamaness from enemies by slaying them or holding down dodge, converting the Marks into Shamanic Mana. Once your Shamanic Mana is full, you gain the ability to transform into the Whisper of Spirit by holding down dodge.
[h3]Whisper of Spirit:[/h3]
You take on the form of a windborne plume that can freely traverse the environment, dealing high damage to enemies in your path and slowing them. Once the form ends, dodge will be unusable for a time.

name: Otherworld Legends: Synthia
summary:
Hero Synthia
A cybernetically augmented and neurally conditioned transhuman, Synthia is able to bring to bear her hulking arsenal of Exoframe to sow carnage among enemies with terrifying ease.
Using exoframe builds up Heat. Upon reaching a threshold, you enter an Overheat state with heightened attack speed and movement speed, as well as a chance to burn enemies with your normal attack.
An actively-firing exoframe can be manually halted and cooled down by holding down its corresponding skill button.
If allowed to peak, excess Heat will trigger an Overload, rendering you unable to perform any action for a time in addition to initiating an extended cooldown on all skills.

name: Otherworld Legends: Sinistar Ruthven
summary:
Skin for Ruthven : Sinistar Ruthven
For seven days and nights, Uriel Longinus, the Ferrum Daemonum, held his ground against the hundred thousand heavenly hosts who would compel his arraignment following his defiance of the Dictum Divinas. Ultimately battered and spent, Uriel was forced to abscond to the realm of man. Consciousness desperately waning, Uriel tethered his primordial animus to the form of a passing novitiate sword-brother - Ruthven - and over the course of the following days and years, clandestinely aided the latter in the honing of his swordcraft, intending to subjugate his mortal corpus once his own faculties were redeemed.
As Ruthven's mettle was whetted to a fine point, so too undeniably brilliant did its glint reflect among the rank and file of his House. Yet, on one fateful day where a sparring duel was to be arranged, Ruthven, in a moment of hubris, unleashed a strike fortified by livid Daemonic energy, instantly damning him as an irredeemable traitor to be hunted for all time. Hopeless and outnumbered against his former kin, Ruthven made one final appeal to Uriel, who answered by manifesting into being - and rebuking their beleaguering troupe of would-be executioners with ruthless efficiency - an act that was apparent in its message to the Celestial Realm. As celestial champions, one after another, set themselves to tracking down the revived Ferrum Daemonum and his human servitor to enforce their demise, the Daemonic duo steel themselves for a stand to the death... for a chance to live.

name: Otherworld Legends: Atomic Girl
summary:
Skin for Anibella : Atomic Girl
Beneath the opulent neon-baptized countenance of Arcarune - the megapolitan hub of technological wonders - a syndicate of institutional malefactors scuttle to enact their Machiavellian machinations, while a coalition of the city's excelsiors - Atomic Girl and her companions - rise to meet them.
Time and time again, Anibella confides in not just her prodigious technological innovations and nonpareil rocket-saddled jockeying skills, but also the indefatigable teamwork of her fellow vigilantes to foil the sinister schemes of Arcarune's criminal underbelly.

name: Otherlights
summary: Otherlights is an action-RPG game with roguelike tendencies designed for 1 to 4 players. In this sunless world, unlock many heroes and develop their destinies to try to access the solar fragment guarded by the powerful Exharques.

name: Other Side Of Mist And Mountain
summary: In 2005, a sophomore student named Igarashi Mahane took a private train to Soukyo City. She disappeared after alighting at a station named "Kisaragi". Five years later, her lover, Yokoyama Shizuno, began investigating the case and strange stories started to unfold one after another.

name: Otherworld Legends: Skin - Mint & Sea Salt Millefeuille
summary: This content requires the base game Otherworld Legends 战魂铭人 on Steam in order to play.

name: Otona no Onna no Uranai Techou
summary: A cancelled Nintendo DS game inspired by the Japan only game Tottoko Hamtaro: Tomodachi Daisakusen Dechu (Hamtaro: Operation Friend), of which would get reworked into the simulator Tomodachi Collection.

name: O.To.I.Re: Dreamcast Sequencer
summary: O.to.i.Re: Dreamcast Sequencer is a Japan-exclusive Sega Dreamcast music creation game by Waka Manufacturing. It was released only in Japan, and allows the player/user to produce his or her own music tracks via the Dreamcast Controller, Dreamcast Microphone, or Dreamcast MIDI Interface Cable. Additionally, this was the only piece of software released in the Dreamcast's lifespan that supported it's MIDI adapter cable.

name: Otokonoko Fishing
summary: Become a boy and go fishing in a city with rivers all around you! Cross-dressing Fishing is an action game-like fishing simulation! Your ultimate goal is to find your missing brother in the distant sea. Equip yourself for this with "Fishing and Cross-dressing"!

name: Otherworld Legends: Wu Fei
summary: This content requires the base game Otherworld Legends 战魂铭人 on Steam in order to play.

name: Otherworld Legends: Skin - Striker Dragoneer
summary: This content requires the base game Otherworld Legends 战魂铭人 on Steam in order to play.

name: Otherworld Legends: Skin - Sunclipse
summary: This content requires the base game Otherworld Legends 战魂铭人 on Steam in order to play.

name: Otherworld Legends: Huo YuFeng
summary: This content requires the base game Otherworld Legends 战魂铭人 on Steam in order to play.

name: Otherworld Apocalypse
summary: The game is a fantasy-themed RPG telling the story of a teenage hexer saving an elven forest from a evil factory. The main character would go on a amazing journey in which he would encounter werewolves, vampiric alpors and other strange creatures.

name: Otoko Orgy at Maid Boy Manor
summary: Your parents are away and it’s time to play! You can finally get your grubby little hands on the sweet and soft maids that work in your mansion, only to find out that these pretty maids are actually… boys?!

name: Otter Island
summary:
Inspired by various classic RPG Maker horror games, like Ib and the Witch's House

It's a warm summer day and Zachary Dove is invited to his friend Connor's summer cottage, along with their other friend, Jeremy.

They are looking forward to a relaxing day of swimming, grilling, and drinking together. Later at night, however, things start to seem strange, and quickly take a turn for the terrifying.

name: Otto's Escape
summary: Help Otto escape a tall tower by individually controlling his jetpack's two boosters to steer and climb your way though 20 hazard-filled floors. Just try not to run out of fuel along the way!

name: Otaku's Adventure: The World Just Keeps Turning
summary:
Will the earth be destroyed soon?
Will you choose only one between the earth and Waifu?
This DLC, player will travel through time and space via a time machine, meet all kinds of different people, find clues and growth, and find ways to save Waifu and the earth.
This DLC content is a continuation of the Waifu's story of the main game.
Complete the entire story of the Waifu.

name: Otenki Kororin: Weather Tales
summary: Otenki Kororin: Weather Tales is a Japan-exclusive weather-themed Puzzle Combat Game by Takumi Corporation done in claymation. Taito originally published it for the Arcade in October of 2001 and then ported it to the PlayStation on May 02, 2002 by Takumi Corporation.

name: O to Z
summary: A fantasy SRPG.

name: Otakus Don't Want to Fall in Love
Otaku Simulator
summary:
Otaku Simulator is a simulation game who the goal is to protect player's reputation
You can kill all of yours enemies who want to destroy your reputation.

name: Otome Senki
summary: Otome Senki is a turn-based dungeon-crawling RPG by Alicesoft

name: Otherworldly Ossuary
summary:
Don't give up skeleton! Fight your way out of space purgatory.
You are already dead, but everything here wants you 7 feet under.

Otherworldly Ossuary﻿ is a small MBF21 single map with cramped puzzle-like combat.

name: Otome Sekai no Arukikata
summary: Set in a near-future Japan after its society became completely dominated by women due to the rampancy of radical feminists and the country introducing the "Gender Segregation Act" decades ago, you are Katagiri Yui, originally a child soldier in the defense forces who eventually got to hid in a remote village under a fake identity, who is ordered by Mother, an social management AI, to attend the training school of the Security Force, a women's armed forces with your adoptive sister.

name: Othello! Japan
summary: Enjoy playing Othello against a computer.

name: Otherworld Legends: Zilan
summary: This content requires the base game Otherworld Legends 战魂铭人 on Steam in order to play.

name: Otherworld Legends: Fluffette
summary: This content requires the base game Otherworld Legends 战魂铭人 on Steam in order to play.

name: Otherskin
summary: Join Alex on her deadly solo-mission to expose the mysteries of planet Vandermire. Experience a truly transformative third-person shooter and absorb organic abilities to expand your combat and movement capabilities beyond anything you’ve seen before.

name: Oto-hime
summary: Shimako, a socially anxious office worker, escapes the pressures of her company's beach retreat by fishing alone, only to stumble upon a trapped turtle by the shore. When she rescues it, Shimako is mysteriously whisked away to a hidden underwater palace, where she meets Oto-hime, a breathtakingly beautiful but enigmatic princess. Drawn in by Oto-hime's charm and her lavish hospitality, Shimako soon realizes there is something unsettling beneath the princess's kind façade.

name: Otherplane
summary: Otherplane is a 1-4 player ghost horror escape room game

name: OttGiu
summary:
An otter on the way to save your friends.

Follow Giuseppe on this adventure!

name: Othello Derby
summary: Othello Derby is an Arcade adaptation of Othello/Reversi. The game is represented through horse racing; players choose between a white or black horse, which corresponds to their color in the game of Othello. You have the choice of three difficulties, though they all have the same set of opponents and the Medium and Hard difficulties simply start you off at the 2nd and 3rd opponents. When the race starts, the Othello board pops up and you are pitted against an animated CPU opponent. Defeat them to win the race and advance to the next, harder opponent. You only have 10 seconds to make each of your moves; if you run of out of time, the game places your piece for you.

name: Othello
summary: Othello is a game of Reversi released by SUCCESS in 1984.

name: Otaku Miracles
summary: A story about you, an anti-social Otaku who is a student at Ashikaga Academy, a very traditional private high school in Japan. Suddenly, you awaken in a place called the Spirit Realm and are tasked with saving the world! How? Well, with the help of your friends of course!

name: Otto’s Galactic Groove!!
summary: Alien music producer Tomie needs inspiration! In this rhythm-action game designed specifically for the Playdate console, it's up to her pet space sea slug Otto to find it in the furthest corners of the galaxy.

name: Othello
summary: Play a game of Othello against an AI.

name: Otherworldly Air Gunship
summary: This is a fun shooting game that includes tower defense elements. You will control an air gunship equipped with three main types of weapons and several powerful special weapons. And leap your army to defeat thousands of monsters from other worlds.

name: Otherworldly: Beginning of the Rift
summary: Is an immersive adventure that challenges you to explore unknown dimensions, solve intricate puzzles, and make choices that impact the unfolding mystery. Dive into the unknown, uncover hidden secrets, and prepare for an experience that could change everything you thought you knew.

name: Otaku Survival Horror
summary: An otaku trapped in a zombie-infested city. Survive the pixelated apocalypse in this retro-style survival horror.

name: Othello: Battle Royale
summary: Rogue Hunt & Deadly Reversal . BR meets roguelike! Swap roles when the Bell rings: Hunt as Black (dash/kill White) or flee as White (use traps/terrain). Every cycle reverses predator & prey. Survive endless role-flips in this lethal cat-and-mouse battle. Last alive wins!

name: Otters and Stones
summary: Build up thriving habitats in this otter kind of clicker.

name: Otterly Lost
summary: Play as Otto, a curious sea otter swept far from home. In this story-rich adventure, explore wild forests, dive underwater, glide over rocky canyons, and climb your way back. Meet friendly animals, complete heartfelt quests, and enjoy soft challenges, at your own pace!

name: Otherside: Untamed Words
summary: OTHERSIDE is a 2D, hand-drawn Metroidvania adventure featuring 'Cat Face' - a hunter awakened from slumber. Wield a sword and brush to explore a beast kingdom, encounter tribes, and uncover secrets.

name: Otherworld Legends: Skin - The Unreturning
summary: This content requires the base game Otherworld Legends 战魂铭人 on Steam in order to play.

name: Otaku Puzzle
summary: Embark on a delightful journey with Otaku Puzzle, a classic sliding puzzle game reimagined with a charming anime kawaii style. Perfect for puzzle enthusiasts of all skill levels, this game offers a relaxing and engaging experience.

name: Otaku's Challenge
summary: Embark on a delightful journey with Otaku's Challenge, a captivating casual puzzle game designed for everyone to enjoy! Immerse yourself in the enchanting world of anime kawaii style with a diverse cast of characters and scenarios.

name: Otter Yakuza
summary: Otter Yakuza is an anime-style action-puzzle game set in a modern Yokohama-inspired city.Lead Zuka, the young Otter Boss, as he rebuilds his fallen clan, clashes with punk Gekkos, and restores honor crate by crate.The river always remembers.

name: Others
summary: This is a retro story game about choices and the voices in your head. Unlock new voices, new thoughts, and new endings.

name: Otar Island
summary: Farm on Otar Island, mine, raise animals, fish, build, and progress through crafting; uncover the island’s secrets as you solve puzzles, raise magical Otars, and challenge the dungeons. Build your island from the ground up and grow it solo or with friends.
